Joined Team {{i}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { headerList } from 'src/app/interfaces/interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-organizational-account', templateUrl: './organizational-account.component.html', styleUrls: ['./organizational-account.component.scss'] }) export class OrganizationalAccountComponent { data:headerList[]=[ { id : 1, isSelected : true, label : 'Joined' }, { id : 2, isSelected : false, label : 'Suggestions' } ]; selectedid:number = 1; getSelectedOne(item:headerList){ console.log(item.label); this.selectedid = item.id; } joinedList = [ {id: 1, name: 'Anusha'}, {id: 2, name: 'madhuri'} ]; suggestionList = [ '3', '4', ] deleteClicked(id:number){ } }
